info.name: Clouding.co API
info.description: API documentation for Clouding.co – manage Hosts, SSH Credentials, Host Groups, Blueprints, Deployment Plans & Runs

item.name: SSH Credentials

request.description: Fetch an SSH credential by ID.

originalRequest.description: Fetch an SSH credential by ID.

request.description: Add a new SSH credential. The private key will be uploaded to object storage.

originalRequest.description: Add a new SSH credential. The private key will be uploaded to object storage.

request.description: Delete an SSH credential by ID.

originalRequest.description: Delete an SSH credential by ID.

item.description: Endpoints related to managing SSH credentials used to connect to VMs.

item.name: Hosts

request.description: Retrieve host details by ID.
List all hosts owned by the authenticated user.

originalRequest.description: List all hosts owned by the authenticated user.

request.description: Register a new host.
Update an existing host.
Delete a host by ID.

item.description: Endpoints for registering, updating, and managing virtual machines (hosts).

item.name: Host Groups

request.description: Get host group details by ID.

originalRequest.description: Get host group details by ID.

request.description: Get all host groups for the user.

originalRequest.description: Get all host groups for the user.

request.description: Create a new host group.
Update an existing host group.
Add hosts to a host group.
Remove a host from a group.

item.description: APIs to group hosts together for bulk operations or categorization.

item.name: Components

request.description: Get component details.
List all available components.

item.description: List of installable components like NGINX, Java, Go, etc.

item.name: Blueprints

request.description: Get blueprint details.
List all blueprints for current user.

originalRequest.description: List all blueprints for current user.

request.description: Create a new blueprint.
Update a blueprint.
Delete a blueprint.
Clone a blueprint.
List deployment plans for a blueprint.

originalRequest.description: List deployment plans for a blueprint.

request.description: List deployment runs for a blueprint.

originalRequest.description: List deployment runs for a blueprint.

item.description: APIs for managing reusable configuration templates (blueprints).

item.name: Deployment Plans

request.description: Create a deployment plan and return progress via SSE.

originalRequest.description: Create a deployment plan and return progress via SSE.

item.description: Create and track deployment plans that link a blueprint to a specific host.

item.name: Deployment Runs

request.description: Trigger apply on a deployment plan and return progress via SSE.

originalRequest.description: Trigger apply on a deployment plan and return progress via SSE.

item.description: Trigger and monitor execution runs for deployment plans.
